TopicTitle: Can not access Docking Linear mode

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I can't use the Linear commands when docking. To clarify what I want to access; you used too access it by pressing <Delete> making sure "LIN" was activated down in the left corner. When I do that now I still have the rotational(ROT) controls. I had to remap keys to make it work, but I'd rather have it work as before. Also even if I change "Control from Here" to another part which would translate in to the controls making different "moves", but it always does the same "movements".

I have tried restarting the game and all, still doesn't help.

-MODS-

I currently have:

Kerbal Engineer

KW Rocketry

It said:

"- Completely revised Input Mapping system." in the 1.0 notes at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/336-KSP-1-0-is-Released

Maybe this is what's happened, but seems like a weird change.

Would appreciate some clarification on this matter.

Thanks in advance!
